abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33085908, pmid33095321, pmid33104154, pmid33085857, pmid33085731, pmid33104999, pmid33075169, pmid33095459, pmid33068387
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.10.28
